# pranavi-convert

A universal data converter created by Puneeth ðŸŒŸ  
Convert any number or string to binary, hex, octal, or ASCII easily.

## Installation
```bash
pip install pranavi-convert
```

## Usage
```python
from pranavi_convert import convert_any, auto_convert

print(convert_any("Puneeth", "binary"))
print(auto_convert(25))
```
